name: @user27828/shared-utils
description: Collection of common utilities I use for various projects

scripts.build: yarn build:utils && yarn build:client && yarn build:server
scripts.build:utils: cd utils && (yarn --version > /dev/null 2>&1 && yarn tsc --outDir ../dist/utils || npx tsc --outDir ../dist/utils)
scripts.build:client: cd client && (yarn --version > /dev/null 2>&1 && yarn tsc --outDir ../dist/client || npx tsc --outDir ../dist/client)
scripts.build:server: cd server && (yarn --version > /dev/null 2>&1 && yarn tsc --outDir ../dist/server || npx tsc --outDir ../dist/server)
scripts.prepare: yarn build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Build failed during prepare, continuing...'
scripts.postinstall: yarn build 2>/dev/null || echo 'Build failed during postinstall, continuing...'
scripts.test: cd client && yarn test && cd ../utils && yarn test && cd ../server && yarn test && cd ..
